job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongemuNO C2C3RD PARTY LOOKING FOR W2 CANDIDATES ONLY must be able to work in the US without sponsorship now or in the futureuemstrongppbrppstrongJob Title Software EngineerstrongppstrongLocation Burlingame CA RemotestrongppstrongDuration 612 MonthsstrongppbrppstrongSummarystrongppLooking for software engineers to contribute towards adopting our libraries build systems and dependencies on a new nonposix operating system Software engineers will work alongside our computer vision staff using multiple repositories to fix build systems and dependencies to bring up a Computer Vision stack SLAMppbrppstrongJob Responsibilitiesstrongpp Integrate computer vision libraries to a new OS and identify and fix missing dependenciespp Back propagate all changes in libraries to the main repositorypp Regularly report job progress to team managementppbrppstrongSkillsstrongpp Expertise in Cpp Design of portable libraries for Linux and Androidpp Strong knowledge of build systems pp Knowledge of version control pp Experience configuring building and testing libraries for Linux and Androidp
